mapper.insert: insert into sf_turn_table_rule (id, create_time, create_man, turn_table_id, times, status, type, modify_time, modify_man, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sf_turn_table_rule set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, turn_table_id = #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, turn_table_id, times, status, type, modify_time, modify_man, remark from sf_turn_table_rule where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
